comments.content:
and i'm also looking for this one:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110130032129im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Unbenannt-8_3861.jpg)

The first one reminds me of Andrea Tinnes's Viceroy:

[http://typecuts.com/fonts\_view.php?kid=8&sid=74](http://web.archive.org/web/20110130032129/http:/typecuts.com/fonts_view.php?kid=8&sid=74 "http://typecuts.com/fonts\_view.php?kid=8&sid=74")

Unfortunately, Viceroy is not for sale.

Mikey :-)

Coles\> perhaps a compendium of Optima alternatives is in order???

:-) Mikey
